message.raw:
Added compiler flag for C++11 otherwise build fails.
Also changed order of add_library and target_link_libraries statements in CMakeLists because otherwise it doesn't when using "catkin build" instead of "catkin_make" (see https://answers.ros.org/question/224698/what-causes-a-library-so-to-be-copied-to-devellib/).

message:
Added compiler flag for C++11 otherwise build fails.
Also changed order of add_library and target_link_libraries statements in CMakeLists because otherwise it doesn't when using "catkin build" instead of "catkin_make" (see https://answers.ros.org/question/224698/what-causes-a-library-so-to-be-copied-to-devellib/).
